DOC.brief_summary: To determine if Tetrix Cream,, when applied to the skin lesions on patients with contact dermatitis, slows or interferes with the healing of the lesions.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Tetrix Cream in the Healing of Injured Skin in Subjects With Contact Dermatitis
DOC.criteria: Normal subjects with sensitivity to nickel. Under 18 years of age.
DOC.keyword: To determine if application of Tetrix Cream to lesions of contact dermatitis interferes with their rate of healing
